attributes.action: Change the law regarding identifying those accused of Rape / Sexual Assault.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In this country, we presume people are innocent until proven guilty. However the press are free to publish identifying details of those people accused of sexual offences.
Recently, there has been cases where innocent people have been accused of serious crimes, yet been found not guilty.
I believe they should receive the same anonimity given to the victim - until proven guilty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
